column1: Uchi////My husband and I have dined at Uchi on several occasions. For a Houston sushi restaurant experience most will not be disappointed. The ambiance is quite lovely and the service has typically been very good as well. We may be a little bit particular as we truly enjoy the freshest sushi we can find and have pretty high expectations. What I will tell you is that when we dined here last week
column2: we found ourselves enjoying other menu items more than the sushi. The sashimi/sushi that we ordered was good
column3: but not as impressive as our previous visits. With that said
column4: they have made a few changes to the menu and these were a couple of our favorites:
